arts.ttl: 'I keep saying it': Portsmouth boss sounds relegation wake-up call after sobering Plymouth defeat
arts.sum: John Mousinho sounded the Pompey wake-up call and insisted: We’re still in relegation danger.

arts.ttl: Key Portsmouth figure sends message to Marlon Pack critics as skipper faces more criticism after Plymouth Argyle struggles
arts.sum: Regan Poole leapt to the defence of Marlon Pack and insisted: ‘We’d be in deep trouble without him.’

arts.ttl: 'Disappointed, angry and frustrated': Portsmouth boss blasts Plymouth display after slumping from Leeds high
arts.sum: John Mousinho declared himself ‘disappointed, angry and frustrated’ as Pompey came crashing back to earth following the giddy heights of Leeds.

arts.ttl: Plymouth boost survival hopes with first away win of season at Pompey
arts.sum: Plymouth recorded their first Sky Bet Championship away win of the season as they beat Portsmouth 2-1 at Fratton Park to boost their survival hopes.

arts.ttl: Struggling Plymouth boost survival hopes with victory at Portsmouth
arts.sum: Matthew Sorinola saw red for the visitors late on.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth 1 Plymouth 2: Neil Allen's verdict - From sublime to the ridiculous as Blues choke after Leeds heroics
arts.sum: Many had feared it would be the case - and so it proved. From beating the Championship leaders to losing against the bottom club, it was depressingly inevitable.

arts.ttl: ‘Facing more questions’, ‘really struggled’, ‘point to prove’: Jordan Cross’ Portsmouth ratings from woeful Plymouth Argyle defeat
arts.sum: The ratings are in from Pompey’s clash with Plymouth Argyle.

arts.ttl: Portsmouth boss John Mousinho sticks with Leeds heroes for crucial clash with Plymouth
arts.sum: John Mousinho has named an unchanged side for the clash with rock bottom Plymouth.

arts.ttl: LIVE Portsmouth v Plymouth Argyle: build-up, team news and live updates from Fratton Park
arts.sum: Pompey aim to take another huge step towards securing their place in the Championship against Plymouth Argyle tonight.

arts.ttl: 'I absolutely love it' - the huge John Mousinho Portsmouth admission that every member of the Fratton faithful will welcome
arts.sum: ‘Very little compares to Portsmouth’. ’It’s a very, very special place to play’. ‘I absolutely love it’. ‘I would love nothing more than to stay here for many, many years.’
